Description: Limestone ostracon: on recto and verso respectively ten and five lines of a continuous administrative text recording an inspection visit by the vizier Neferrenpet, followed by the distribution of bread amongst the workmen listed.
Curator's comments: K. Kitchen, Ramesside Inscriptions' VII (Oxford, 1989), 336-7 (erroneously called O Cairo J. 50744); J.J. Janssen, 'Village Varia' (Leiden, 1997), p. 166.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136389) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136389)
